desc1: A white paper is an authoritative report or guide that informs readers concisely about a complex issue and presents the issuing body's philosophy on the matter. It is meant to help readers understand an issue, solve a problem, or make a decision.
desc2: Marketers create whitepapers to educate their audience about a particular issue, or explain and promote a particular methodology.
address: Phillipines Office , Brgy 26 purok 1 Gingoog City Grahian lipunan Misamis Oriental
